long_description: The durable Kelty Discovery 4 Tent has a simple 2-pole design that is easy to set up in any weather, at any time. Its roomy interior provides 3-season livability for 4 campers. Freestanding design makes it simple to move the tent around to find the ideal spot; easy-clip poles make setup and takedown fast. Full-coverage rainfly with sealed seams won't sag when wet; and adjustable webbing/side-release buckles attach rainfly to tent. Large single door simplifies entry and exit; single vestibule keeps the door dry and stores gear out of the rain. 1,800mm polyurethane coated polyester canopy, floor and rainfly. The Kelty Discovery 4 Tent features 4 internal pockets for organizing small gear.
short_description: The durable Kelty Discovery 4 Tent has a simple 2-pole design that is easy to set up in any weather, at any time. Its roomy interior provides 3-season livability for 4 campers.
